column3: Latest; Siem Reap: At 21.30 pm on July 27
column5: police and local authorities detained a gang of youths who always gather along the fence outside Siem Reap International Airport
column6: creating noise and disturbances.------Around 20 people and 9 motorbikes were taken to the Inspectorate of Siem Reap for education and drug testing.------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/60353
